entry.question: What brings you to this Krishna-conscious community? Are you here to explore, learn, or something else?
Are you someone who values respectful dialogue, even when views differ?
What are your views on Srila Prabhupada and ISKCON?

reflective.question: What do you feel when you see someone living a calm, spiritual life centered on devotion?
What would you ask Krishna if He stood before you right now?
Have you ever felt a connection to something divine or spiritual?
Is there any spiritual quality (like patience or humility) you wish to develop?

trusted.question: What does humility mean to you in a spiritual or personal sense?
If someone peacefully questioned your beliefs, how would you respond?

medium.question: How would you handle it if your beliefs were mocked online?
If someone mocked Krishna or bhakti near you, what would you feel or do?

high.question: What would you do if a devotee corrected you firmly on a topic?
If told your views don't align with the bhakti philosophy here, how would you respond?
